João Paulo Costeira is an Associate Professor at the **Instituto Superior Técnico (IST), University of Lisbon**. 
He holds a Ph.D. in Electrical and Computer Engineering from IST. He is a senior researcher with the **Signal and Image 
Processing Group (SIPg)** and has served as its group coordinator, where he conducts research in computer vision and robotics. 
He is a former co-director of the Dual Ph.D. Program in Electrical and Computer Engineering and Robotics within the **Carnegie 
Mellon | Portugal program**. He also served as the Scientific Director of the **Carnegie Mellon | Portugal initiative** from 2014 to 2018.
